data.quote: The man who does not read books has no advantage over the one who cannot read them.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
data.author: Malcolm X

data.quote: Teachers can open the door, but you must enter it yourself.
data.author: Chinese proverb

data.quote: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you.
data.author: B.B. King

data.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon you can use to change the world.
data.author: B.B. King

data.quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled but a fire to be ignited.
data.author: Plutarch

data.quote: Don’t let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
data.author: John Wooden

data.quote: Learning is never done without errors and defeat.
data.author: Vladimir Lenin

data.quote: Never let the fear of striking out stop you from playing the game.
data.author: Babe Ruth

data.quote: Procrastination makes easy things hard and hard things harder.
data.author: Mason Cooley

data.quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
data.author: Helen Hayes.

data.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
data.author: Beverly Stills

data.quote: I think it’s possible to ordinary people to choose to be extraordinary.
data.author: Elon Musk

data.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
data.author: Thomas Jefferson

data.quote: Genius is 10% inspiration, 90% perspiration.
data.author: Thomas Edison

data.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
data.author: Jim Ryun

data.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated.
data.author: R Collier

data.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln
